mapper.select: SELECT a.user_no, c.auth_cd, c.auth_nm, c.auth_seq FROM TB_USER_SAMPLE a left join tb_user_auth_SAMPLE b ON a.user_no = b.user_no left join tb_auth_SAMPLE c ON b.auth_seq=c.auth_seq WHERE a.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER_SAMPLE SET login_fail_cnt = 0, acct_locked_yn='N' WHERE user_id=#{userId}
UPDATE TB_USER_SAMPLE SET LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = LOGIN_FAIL_CNT+1 WHERE user_id=#{userId}
UPDATE TB_USER_SAMPLE SET acct_locked_yn = 'Y' WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.menu_seq, a.up_menu_seq, a.menu_url, a.menu_nm, a.menu_ord, a.menu_type_cd, c.auth_seq, c.auth_cd, a.top_menu_seq, a.open_yn from tb_menu_SAMPLE a left outer join tb_auth_menu_SAMPLE b ON a.menu_seq= b.menu_seq left outer join tb_auth_SAMPLE c ON b.auth_seq= c.auth_seq WHERE a.use_yn='Y' AND b.auth_seq= #{authSeq} order by a.menu_ord
SELECT * from tb_menu_SAMPLE where use_yn='Y' and menu_type_cd='010' order by menu_ord

SELECT menu_seq, up_menu_seq, menu_nm, menu_url, menu_type_cd, menu_ord, etc, use_yn, open_yn, (SELECT COUNT(MENU_SEQ) FROM TB_MENU_SAMPLE WHERE UP_MENU_SEQ = A.MENU_SEQ AND USE_YN = 'Y') subMenuCnt from TB_MENU_SAMPLE a where use_yn='Y' AND up_menu_seq=#{menuSeq} order by up_menu_seq, menu_ord,menu_type_cd

SELECT a.auth_seq, a.path_seq, a.path_auth_seq, b.up_path_seq, b.path, c.auth_cd FROM tb_path_auth_SAMPLE a join tb_path_SAMPLE b on a.path_seq= b.path_seq join tb_auth_SAMPLE c on a.auth_seq=c.auth_seq where c.use_yn= 'Y' and c.auth_type_cd='030' and b.path_seq=#{pathSeq}
SELECT * FROM TB_PATH_SAMPLE where up_path_seq=0 order by path_ord
